DOC.brief_summary: To study effect compression stocking sleep apnea hemodialysis patient diagnose obstructive sleep apnea . The rationale study consist fluid shift theory , consist nocturnal rostral fluid shift leg , cause upper airway edema . The aim study evaluate compression stocking could improve nocturnal volume redistribution , therefore , improve obstructive sleep apnea .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Compression Stockings Obstructive Sleep Apnea Patients Under Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators apply follow method : - Sleep study , perform polysomnography - Fluid redistribution , bioimpedance analysis - Autonomic nervous system evaluation , spectral heart rate variability analysis . The study protocol comprise two moment : baseline evaluation ( patient diagnose sleep apnea ) use compression stocking one-week period .
DOC.criteria: Patients hemodialysis Patients diagnose obstructive sleep apnea Congestive heart failure Urine output > 500 ml/day nonsinusal cardiac rhythm refusal give write consent
